meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unearthly.
meanings.sent1: The unearthlinesses of the abandoned house gave me chills.
meanings.sent2: The movie's eerie unearthlinesses left me feeling unsettled.
meanings.sent3: The unearthlinesses of the situation made me question if I was dreaming.
meanings.sent4: The unearthlinesses of the fog enveloped the town in a mysterious shroud.
meanings.sent5: The unearthlinesses of the forest at night made it seem like a different world.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being strange or otherworldly.
meanings.sent1: The unearthlinesses of the alien creature fascinated the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the artist's vision of unearthlinesses perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The unearthlinesses of the new technology seemed like something out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: The unearthlinesses of the music transported the listeners to another realm.
meanings.sent5: The unearthlinesses of the old castle made it seem haunted.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being disconnected from reality.
meanings.sent1: His mind wandered into unearthlinesses during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent2: The unearthlinesses of the dream lingered long after he woke up.
meanings.sent3: She felt a sense of unearthlinesses as she stared out into the vast ocean.
meanings.sent4: The unearthlinesses of the virtual reality game made it hard to distinguish between real and fake.
meanings.sent5: The unearthlinesses of the empty room made her feel like she was in a different dimension.
